ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Database. It implements the singleton pattern so only one Database object can exist.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Database getInstance()
        Get a database instance.

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context context)
        Init method for the database. Handle the offline mode settings and enables persistence. IMPORTANT: this method MUST be called in the InitActivity before other calls to the Database class are performed.
        Parameters:
        context - context of the application.

      • getReference

        public DatabaseReference getReference()
        Get a reference to the root of the database.

      • setOfflineMode

        public void setOfflineMode()
        Enable the DB offline mode. Requests for which data is cached can still be answered. Other requests will be enqueued until online mode is set.

      • setOnlineMode

        public void setOnlineMode()
        Enable the DB online mode.

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        Check if the DB connection is up.
        Returns:
        true if DB connection is up, false otherwise.
